channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Control Desk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Control Desk

item.title: CVE-2022-22330|2024-09-16T16:54:01.304Z -- ibm -- control%20desk
item.description: IBM Control Desk 7.6.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 219126.
